question: Which of the following denotes ‘shares outstanding' ?
option1: Difference between authorised capital and issued capital of a company
option2: Difference between issued capital and subscribed capital of a company
option3: Difference between subscribed capital and paid up capital of a company
option4: Shares of the company issued and purchased by investors and are held by them
answer: Shares of the company issued and purchased by investors and are held by them
